11
12#ifndef ISC_PLATFORM_H
13#define ISC_PLATFORM_H 1
14
15/*! \file */
16
17/*****
18 ***** Platform-dependent defines.
19 *****/
20
21/***
22 *** Thread-Local Storage
23 ***/
24
25#ifdef HAVE___THREAD
26#define thread_local __thread
27#endif
28
29/***
30 *** Default strerror_r buffer size
31 ***/
32
33#define ISC_STRERRORSIZE 128
34
35/***
36 *** Miscellaneous.
37 ***/
38
39/*
40 * Defined to <gssapi.h> or <gssapi/gssapi.h> for how to include
41 * the GSSAPI header.
42 */
43#define ISC_PLATFORM_GSSAPIHEADER <gssapi/gssapi.h>
44
45/*
46 * Defined to <gssapi_krb5.h> or <gssapi/gssapi_krb5.h> for how to
47 * include the GSSAPI KRB5 header.
48 */
49#define ISC_PLATFORM_GSSAPI_KRB5_HEADER <gssapi/gssapi_krb5.h>
50
51/*
52 * Defined to <krb5.h> or <krb5/krb5.h> for how to include
53 * the KRB5 header.
54 */
55#define ISC_PLATFORM_KRB5HEADER <krb5/krb5.h>
56
57/*
58 * Define if the platform has <sys/un.h>.
59 */
60#define ISC_PLATFORM_HAVESYSUNH 1
61
62/*
63 * Defines for the noreturn attribute.
64 */
65#define ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE
66#define ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST __attribute__((noreturn))
67
68/***
69 *** Windows dll support.
70 ***/
71
72#define LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA
73#define LIBDNS_EXTERNAL_DATA
74#define LIBISCCC_EXTERNAL_DATA
75#define LIBISCCFG_EXTERNAL_DATA
76#define LIBNS_EXTERNAL_DATA
77#define LIBBIND9_EXTERNAL_DATA
78#define LIBTESTS_EXTERNAL_DATA
79
80/*
81 * Tell emacs to use C mode for this file.
82 *
83 * Local Variables:
84 * mode: c
85 * End:
86 */
87
88#endif /* ISC_PLATFORM_H */
89
